title: SET_ENTITY_HEADING
content:
0x8E2530AA8ADA980E0xE0FF064D// SetEntityHeading
void SET_ENTITY_HEADING(Entity entity, float heading);Parameters:entity: The entity to set the heading for.heading: The heading in degrees.Set the heading of an entity in degrees also known as "Yaw".Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#SetEntityHeading(PlayerPedId(), 40.0)
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityHeading
void SET_ENTITY_HEADING(Entity entity, float heading);
